short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for easily removing or hiding tweets in your timeline with a certain hashtag or keywords.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of weekly spoilers showing up on your Twitter Timeline? Or perhaps, you're tired of seeing a certain hashtag or topic being discussed. With Social Muter, you can filter out all of that noise from your timeline and show only content that you really want to see, when you want to see it.
